Package com.group4.Auber.HUD

Class HealthBar

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.group4.Auber.HUD.HealthBar
public class HealthBar
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
Draws a rectangular health bar with black background. The start value is 100% with the current value being the value that changes as the health changes.
Author:
Robert Watts

  • Constructor Details

    • HealthBar

      public HealthBar​(float height, float width, java.lang.String title, int startValue, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont font)
      Construct the class, and save the initial variables
      Parameters:
      height - the height of the bar
      width - the width of the bar
      title - the title used within the health bar
      startValue - the start value
      font - the font to use

      startValue - the start value

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch batch, float parentAlpha)
      Draw the health bar.
      Overrides:
      draw in class com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      Parameters:
      batch - The current batch from the satage
      parentAlpha - The parent alpha

    • setCurrentValue

      public void setCurrentValue​(int currentValue)
      Set the current value of the health. This value is divided by startValue to get a percentage, which is then used to calculate the width of the health bar.
      Parameters:
      currentValue - the current value (integer)

    • getTextLayout

      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.GlyphLayout getTextLayout()
      Get the label text layout
      Returns:
      GlyphLayout for use in a label

    • setStartValue

      public void setStartValue​(int startValue)
      Set the max value of the health. This value is used in conjunction with the current value to calculate the width of the health bar.
      Parameters:
      startValue - the initial value.
